languages.text: "Не пытайся меня поддеть — согласно Лекс Империалис я не в праве судить держател{mf|я|ьницу} священного Патента. Это четкое ограничение освобождает меня от пустых размышлений".
"Do not try to bait me — the Lex Imperialis states that I have no right to judge the bearer of the sacred Warrant. This clear restriction spares me from having to indulge in pointless deliberations."
languages.original_text: "Не пытайся меня поддеть — согласно Лекс Империалис я не в праве судить держател{mf|я|ьницу} священного Патента. Это четкое ограничение освобождает меня от пустых размышлений".

traits.locale_text: "Do not try to bait me — the Lex Imperialis states that I have no right to judge the bearer of the sacred Warrant. This clear restriction spares me from pointless deliberations."

"Do not try to bait me — the Lex Imperialis states that I have no right to judge the bearer of the sacred Warrant. This clear restriction spares me from having to indulge in pointless deliberations."

languages.text: 「俺を挑発しようとするな。レックス・インペリアは、聖なる令状の所有者を裁く権利を俺に認めてはいない。その厳然たる制約のおかげで、無益な熟考に付き合わなくてもよいというわけだ」
languages.original_text: "Do not try to bait me — the Lex Imperialis states that I have no right to judge the bearer of the sacred Warrant. This clear restriction spares me from having to indulge in pointless deliberations."

traits.locale_text: 「俺を挑発しようとするな。レックス・インペリアは、聖なる令状の所有者を裁く権利を俺に認めてはいない。その厳然たる制約のおかげで、無益な熟考に付き合わなくてもよいというわけだ」

languages.text: "Versucht nicht, mich zu ködern – das Lex Imperia besagt, dass ich nicht das Recht habe, Träger des heiligen Handelsbriefs zu richten. Dank dieser eindeutigen Einschränkung brauche ich mich nicht in sinnlosen Überlegungen zu ergehen."
languages.original_text: "Do not try to bait me — the Lex Imperialis states that I have no right to judge the bearer of the sacred Warrant. This clear restriction spares me from having to indulge in pointless deliberations."

traits.locale_text: "Versucht nicht, mich zu ködern – das Lex Imperia besagt, dass ich nicht das Recht habe, Träger des heiligen Handelsbriefs zu richten. Dank dieser eindeutigen Einschränkung brauche ich mich nicht in sinnlosen Überlegungen zu ergehen."

languages.text: «No intente provocarme. La Lex Imperialis dicta que no tengo derecho a juzgar a{mf|l| la} portador{mf||a} de la sagrada Patente. Esta restricción me ahorra tener que debatir asuntos sin sentido».
languages.original_text: "Do not try to bait me — the Lex Imperialis states that I have no right to judge the bearer of the sacred Warrant. This clear restriction spares me from having to indulge in pointless deliberations."

traits.locale_text: «No intente provocarme. La Lex Imperialis dicta que no tengo derecho a juzgar a{mf|l| la} portador{mf||a} de la sagrada Patente. Esta restricción me ahorra tener que debatir asuntos sin sentido».

languages.text: “别打算套我的话。根据帝国法典规定，我无权评判神圣授状的持有者。法典明确规定了这一点，因此我没必要沉溺于毫无意义的思索。”
languages.original_text: "Do not try to bait me — the Lex Imperialis states that I have no right to judge the bearer of the sacred Warrant. This clear restriction spares me from having to indulge in pointless deliberations."

traits.locale_text: “别打算套我的话。根据帝国法典规定，我无权评判神圣授状的持有者。法典明确规定了这一点，因此我没必要沉溺于毫无意义的思索。”

languages.text: "Beni kışkırtmaya çalışma. Lex İmperialis, Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin Hamili'ni yargılama hakkım olmadığını açıkça belirtir. Bu net kısıtlama, beni gereksiz tartışmalara girmekten kurtarıyor."
languages.original_text: "Do not try to bait me — the Lex Imperialis states that I have no right to judge the bearer of the sacred Warrant. This clear restriction spares me from having to indulge in pointless deliberations."

traits.locale_text: "Beni kışkırtmaya çalışma. Lex İmperialis, kutsal Ruhsatname'nin hamilini yargılama hakkım olmadığını açıkça belirtir. Bu net kısıtlama, beni gereksiz tartışmalara girmekten kurtarıyor."

languages.original_text: "Do not try to bait me — the Lex Imperialis states that I have no right to judge the bearer of the sacred Warrant. This clear restriction spares me from having to indulge in pointless deliberations."

languages.text: « N'essayez pas de me provoquer. La Lex Imperialis stipule que je n'ai pas le droit de juger {mf|le détenteur|la détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée. Cette interdiction m'épargne de m'engager dans des délibérations inutiles. »
languages.original_text: "Do not try to bait me — the Lex Imperialis states that I have no right to judge the bearer of the sacred Warrant. This clear restriction spares me from having to indulge in pointless deliberations."

traits.locale_text: « N'essayez pas de me provoquer. La Lex Imperialis stipule que je n'ai pas le droit de juger {mf|le détenteur|la détentrice} de la lettre de marque sacrée. Cette interdiction m'épargne de m'engager dans des délibérations inutiles. »
